subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For Mets outfielder Moises Alou, hardly a day passes when he does not think about the night of July 27, 1995, when his father-in-law and a brother-in-law were shot to death during a robbery attempt in Brooklyn.
snippet: For Mets outfielder Moises Alou, hardly a day passes when he does not think about the night of July 27, 1995, when his father-in-law and a brother-in-law were shot to death during a robbery attempt in Brooklyn.
